mapper.update: update brand set accept=true where brandNum=#{brandNum}
mapper.select: select * from brand ORDER BY brandNum desc
SELECT * FROM brand WHERE brandNum=#{brandNum} OR username=#{username}
select count(*) from brand where registrationNum=#{registrationNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO brand(username, companyName, registrationNum, companyHomepage, managerName, managerPhone, managerEmail, brandName, brandIntro, referenceFile, accept) VALUES (#{username}, #{companyName}, #{registrationNum}, #{companyHomepage}, #{managerName}, #{managerPhone}, #{managerEmail}, #{brandName}, #{brandIntro}, #{referenceFile}, #{accept});
